Delhis durchschnittlicher AQI sank am Freitag stark auf 236 von 380 am Donnerstag, was CAQM dazu veranlasste, die GRAP-Stufe-III-Bordsteine ​​aufzuheben, obwohl das IMD eine gelbe Warnung wegen Nebel ausgab und vor einer möglichen Verschlechterung ab Sonntag warnte.

title: Flights cancelled at Dublin Airport and school reopenings under threat as Arctic blast to bring snow, ice and lows of -4C

Irland steht vor einer arktischen Explosion, da die Temperaturen am Wochenende auf fast -4 °C sinken werden – wobei einige nördliche Gebiete mit Schnee, Eis, gefrierendem Nebel und starkem Frost konfrontiert sind.

en: School holiday alert: Winter vacations extended across Delhi, UP, Haryana, Bihar, Rajasthan and other states due to severe cold wave. School Holidays: A severe cold wave has prompted several Indian states to temporarily close schools, prioritising student safety amid extreme temperatures and dense fog. Closures vary by region, with some extending until mid‑January, while others have adjuste…
la: Scholae feriae intenti: feriae hiemales trans Delhi, UP, Haryana, Bihar, Rajasthan et aliae civitates ob undam gravem frigidam extenditur. Scholae Feriae: Graves unda frigidae complures Civitates Indianas ad tempus scholas claudendas suasit, prioritizing student salutem inter extremas temperaturas et nebulam densam. Clausurae regioni variantur, quibusdam extensis usque ad medium Ianuarias, aliis vero accommodant...

title: Dense fog advisory issued as fog sparks deadly 17-car pileup on Hwy 99 in Fresno
description: “Please slow down, especially in inclement weather — fog specifically,” California Highway Patrol spokesperson Mike Salas.
content: It had been some time since a major multi-vehicle collision occurred on a Fresno highway, but that changed on Sunday when a 17-vehicle pileup on Highway 99, between North and Cedar Avenues, left one … [+1696 chars]
de: Warnung vor dichtem Nebel, da Nebel eine tödliche Massenkarambolage mit 17 Autos auf dem Highway 99 in Fresno auslöst. „Bitte fahren Sie langsamer, besonders bei schlechtem Wetter – insbesondere bei Nebel“, sagte Mike Salas, Sprecher der California Highway Patrol.
en: Dense fog advisory issued as fog sparks deadly 17-car pileup on Hwy 99 in Fresno. “Please slow down, especially in inclement weather — fog specifically,” California Highway Patrol spokesperson Mike Salas.
la: Nebula densa advisorium edita ut scintillae nebulae funestae 17-car pileup in Hwy 99 in Fresno. "Quaeso tardus, praesertim in intemperie caeli, specie nebulae," California Highway Patrol loquens Mike Salas.
